column4: my system say it is last update 32 days ago ,but I have been downloading secirty updates this whole time.  It says it can't update this http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/hardy/Release  Unable to find expected entry  web/binary-i386/Packages in Meta-index file (malformed Release file?).  What should I do ?
change your sources, remove the us. from in front of all of them
if you remove "us." your packages will come direct from the main servers, which are always up to date
system > administration > software sources provides a GUI to set your sources.list
